item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Caltrain's Electric Fleet More Efficient Than Expected (99 points | 48 comments)
2. You could have invented Fenwick trees (43 points | 9 comments)
3. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI (465 points | 101 comments)
4. Show HN: Trolling SMS spammers with Ollama (100 points | 33 comments)
5. Wild – A fast linker for Linux (276 points | 121 comments)
6. Show HN: Lightpanda, an open-source headless browser in Zig (114 points | 80 comments)
7. A phishing attack involving g.co, Google's URL shortener (223 points | 95 comments)
8. Show HN: Onit – open-source ChatGPT Desktop with local mode, Claude, Gemini (76 points | 31 comments)
9. File Explorer is merged to Helix editor (19 points | 5 comments)
10. Snowdrop OS – a homebrew operating system from scratch, in assembly language (190 points | 42 comments)
11. Her dad, the 10k records he left behind and a viral lesson in grief (52 points | 23 comments)
12. Android SMS Gateway Using MQTT (10 points | 2 comments)
13. The hidden complexity of scaling WebSockets (71 points | 19 comments)
14. Subpixel Snake [video] (194 points | 41 comments)
15. Trying out Zed after more than a decade of Vim/Neovim (124 points | 76 comments)
16. Chatbox: Cross-platform desktop client for ChatGPT, Claude and other LLMs (28 points | 3 comments)
17. Anatomy of a Formal Proof (88 points | 1 comment)
18. New book-sorting algorithm almost reaches perfection (171 points | 38 comments)
19. Cytoskeleton-functionalized synthetic cells with life-like mechanical features (11 points | 1 comment)
20. Nuclear Proliferation and the "Nth Country Experiment" (33 points | 6 comments)
21. A very Chicago gamble (109 points | 52 comments)
22. How I Use Home Assistant in 2025 (171 points | 172 comments)
23. A WebAssembly compiler that fits in a tweet (196 points | 23 comments)
24. Show HN: I recovered one of my earliest ZX-Spectrum games from an audio cassette (10 points | discuss)
25. Converge (YC S23) is hiring engineer #2 in NYC ( | hide)
26. Frustrated YouTube viewers seek explanation for hour-long unskippable ads (21 points | 20 comments)
27. Ask HN: Why buy domains and 301 redirect them to me? (243 points | 85 comments)
28. VIC 20 Elite (41 points | 12 comments)
29. Kidnappers sever finger of cryptocurrency millionaire David Balland (6 points | discuss)
30. Cloud Virtualization: Red Hat, AWS Firecracker, and Ubicloud internals (45 points | 8 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
